title: This game makes me emotionally unstable.
body:
I have spent so much money on this game, $1500 to be precise. I was so excited to see dragon trainer tristana. But when I saw her death animation I wanted to cri.

rip  ;^(

replies.body: What really made me emotionally unstable was the $1500 xD But I'm not gonna judge, I spend almost the same amount in clothing and food. And yeah, the death animation broke my heart. Good reason to never die during a game with this skin :D

$1500... you coulda bought a better computer with that instead D:

i don't spend money on online games, but it doesn't hurt when someone is nice enough to gift me rp or a skin :3, although i also don't like it because i am then obliged to somehow pay them back ;-;
